definition: to collect words/to harvest entries for a dictionary
to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)
word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]

sentences.english: Finally, the writer expounds some opinions on the dictionary editing principle.
sentences.chinese: 最後，對《大詞典》收詞原則提出一點商榷意見。
這本詞典共收詞8萬餘條。
